product.title: Curling Iron, Jungle Wave Pro Airflow Styler 2 in 1 Hair Straightener and Curler, Ionic Ceramic Flat Iron with 360° Cool Air, 1 Inch, White
product.description:
What's The 360° Airflow Styler Curling Iron?
Your old curling iron is not holding curls? It's because you are letting your hair drop when it's hot and malleable. The Jungle Wave flat iron comes with 1 inch barrel diameter and the brilliant cool airflow technology instantly cools down your hair to set its shape and lock in style. Now you can create effortless and long-lasting curls at home.


It's time to revolutionize your hair styling routine.
Elevate your style, protect your hair, and unleash your inner confidence with this hair straightener featuring the remarkable 360° vented cool airflow

This 2 in 1 Hair Straightener and Curler for travel essentials with an exquisite gift package is the perfect gift for women and men, treat it as an exquisite gift for your lover, friend, and girlfriend on any special day, such as an Anniversary, Christmas, Birthday, Valentine's Day, or Mother's Day.

product.description_full:
What's The 360° Airflow Styler Curling Iron?
Your old curling iron is not holding curls? It's because you are letting your hair drop when it's hot and malleable. The Jungle Wave flat iron comes with 1 inch barrel diameter and the brilliant cool airflow technology instantly cools down your hair to set its shape and lock in style. Now you can create effortless and long-lasting curls at home.


It's time to revolutionize your hair styling routine.
Elevate your style, protect your hair, and unleash your inner confidence with this hair straightener featuring the remarkable 360° vented cool airflow

This 2 in 1 Hair Straightener and Curler for travel essentials with an exquisite gift package is the perfect gift for women and men, treat it as an exquisite gift for your lover, friend, and girlfriend on any special day, such as an Anniversary, Christmas, Birthday, Valentine's Day, or Mother's Day. * Innovative Airflow System - Unlock the secret to long-lasting, gorgeous curls with our unique airflow styler. The 360° Vented Cool Airflow System and 88 ionic cool air vents distribute air evenly, protecting your precious locks from thermal damage, and giving you a flawless and resilient hairstyle that lasts.
 * 2 in 1Endless Styling Possibilities - Forget the hassle of juggling multiple styling tools. Our 2 in 1 hair straightener and curler combines the functionality of a straightener and a curling iron, streamlining your morning routine and saving you precious time without sacrificing style.
 * Extraordinary Styling Experience - This hair straightener boasts an ergonomic thumb grip and a distinctive body sinking, which is meticulously crafted to fit the contours of your hand. You can style more hair volume at once, and embrace the efficiency of hair styling.
 * User-Friendly Directional Switch - With its flexible temperature control, this airflow styler allows for effortless usage, providing convenience and ease. Furthermore, there is no longer an accidental button presses during operation!
 * Free Temperature Regulation - Crafted with precision and simplicity in mind, this versatile air styler offers 5 temperature settings from 280℉ to 430℉, allowing you to adjust the heat to meet your unique hair needs.
 * Specification:
   Brand: Jungle Wave
   Color: White
   Plate Type: 3D Ceramic Floating Nano-Titanium
   Barrel Diameter: 1 Inch
   Universal Dual Voltage+: 110-240V
   Temp Setting: 280°-430°
   Power Cord: 8 ft 360° Swivel Cord
   Auto Shut-Off: 60 Mins
   
 * Package comes with:
   Salon Ceramic Airflow Styler Flat Iron
   2PCS Scald-proof gloves
   2PCS Hair Clips
   Exquisite gift box

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
